attributes.action: Replace the current road taxing system with a system based on usage, incorporating a mechanism to recognise the amount of carbon used per journey.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current road tax system is no longer suitable  for purpose. Those who choose to use the roads should pay for that use.

The system must be simple to understand and use while recognising that there are many different types of road users.

A mechanism to relate charges to carbon emmissions should be incorporated within the overall charge.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
